entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 7.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or snow beginning near midnight then changing to light snow before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm.
